gvcf_indexes.description: An array of indexes for the input gVCFS. Must have the same order as the gvcfs array.

region.description: The region to process. Optional, but recommended.

compute_workers.description: The number of VMs to use for joint genotyping (default: 4).

gvcftyper_memory.description: Memory usage for joint calling VMs (default: 128 GiB).

gvcftyper_threads.description: The number of threads for joint calling (default: 32).

output_splits.description: Split the final output into this many VCFs (default: 5; aproximate).

merge_memory.description: Memory usage for merge VMs (default: 128 GiB).

merge_threads.description: The number of threads for merging (default: 32).

driver_xargs.description: Additional arguments passed to the Sentieon driver (default: --traverse_param 10000/200).

gvcftyper_xargs.description: Additional arguments passed to the GVCFtyper algo (default: --genotype_model multinomial --max_alt_alleles 12).

debug.description: Output additional debugging information. Very verbose (default: false).

canonical_user_id.description: Your account's AWS canonical user ID. Used to acquire a Sentieon license
